trans-unit.source: Specifies enumerated constants used to retrieve directory paths to system special folders.
trans-unit.target: Specifica costanti enumerate usate per recuperare percorsi di directory a cartelle speciali di sistema.

trans-unit.source: The system special folders are folders such as **Program Files**, **Programs**, **System**, or **Startup**, which contain common information.
trans-unit.target: Le cartelle speciali di sistema sono cartelle, ad esempio **programmi**, **programmi**, **sistema**, o **avvio**, che contengono comuni informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Le cartelle speciali vengono impostate per impostazione predefinita dal sistema oppure in modo esplicito dall'utente, quando si installa una versione di Windows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Environment.GetFolderPath%2A> method returns the locations associated with this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Environment.GetFolderPath%2A> metodo restituisce i percorsi associati all'enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: The locations of these folders can have different values on different operating systems, the user can change some of the locations, and the locations are localized.
trans-unit.target: I percorsi di queste cartelle possono presentare valori diversi in sistemi operativi diversi, l'utente può modificare alcune delle posizioni e i percorsi sono localizzati.

trans-unit.source: For more information about special folders, see the [KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) constants in the Windows documentation.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle cartelle speciali, vedere il [KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) costanti nella documentazione di Windows.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder> with the <xref:System.Environment.GetFolderPath%2A> method to get the System directory.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder> con il <xref:System.Environment.GetFolderPath%2A> metodo per ottenere la directory di sistema.

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that is used to store administrative tools for an individual user.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system usata per archiviare strumenti amministrativi per un singolo utente.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Management Console (MMC) will save customized consoles to this directory, and it will roam with the user.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Management Console (MMC) salverà le console personalizzate in questa directory e verrà eseguito il roaming.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data for the current roaming user.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository comune dei dati specifici dell'applicazione per l'utente roaming corrente.

trans-unit.source: A roaming user works on more than one computer on a network.
trans-unit.target: Un utente mobile funziona su più computer in una rete.

trans-unit.source: A roaming user's profile is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on.
trans-unit.target: Un profilo utente comune verrà mantenuto in un server nella rete e viene caricato in un sistema quando l'utente effettua l'accesso.

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that acts as a staging area for files waiting to be written to a CD.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che viene usata come un'area di gestione temporanea per i file in attesa di essere scritti su un CD.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains administrative tools for all users of the computer.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene strumenti amministrativi per tutti gli utenti del computer.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data that is used by all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository comune dei dati specifici dell'applicazione usati da tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains files and folders that appear on the desktop for all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene file e cartelle che vengono visualizzati sul desktop di tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems.
trans-unit.target: Questa cartella speciale è valida solo per i sistemi Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains documents that are common to all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene documenti comuni a tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: This special folder is valid for Windows NT systems, Windows 95, and Windows 98 systems with Shfolder.dll installed.
trans-unit.target: Questa cartella speciale è valida per i sistemi Windows NT, Windows 95 e Windows 98 con Shfolder.dll installato.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that serves as a repository for music files common to all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che viene usata come repository per i file musicali comuni a tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This value is recognized in Windows Vista for backward compatibility, but the special folder itself is no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore è riconosciuto in Windows Vista per la compatibilità con le versioni precedenti, ma la cartella speciale non è più usata.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that serves as a repository for image files common to all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che viene usata come repository per i file di immagine comuni a tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory for components that are shared across applications.
trans-unit.target: Directory per i componenti condivisi da più applicazioni.

trans-unit.source: To get the x86 common program files directory on a non-x86 system, use the <see cref="F:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFilesX86" /> member.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere la directory dei file di programma comuni x86 in un sistema non x86, usare il membro <see cref="F:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFilesX86" />.

trans-unit.source: The **Program Files** folder.
trans-unit.target: Cartella **Programmi**.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A folder for components that are shared across applications.
trans-unit.target: Cartella per i componenti condivisi da più applicazioni.

trans-unit.source: This special folder is valid only for Windows NT, Windows 2000, and Windows XP systems.
trans-unit.target: Questa cartella speciale è valida solo per i sistemi Windows NT, Windows 2000 e Windows XP.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains the programs and folders that appear on the **Start** menu for all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene i programmi e le cartelle che vengono visualizzati nel menu **Start** per tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems.
trans-unit.target: Questa cartella speciale è valida solo per i sistemi Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains the programs that appear in the **Startup** folder for all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene i programmi che vengono visualizzati nella cartella **Avvio** per tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems.
trans-unit.target: Questa cartella speciale è valida solo per i sistemi Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains the templates that are available to all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene i modelli disponibili per tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems.
trans-unit.target: Questa cartella speciale è valida solo per i sistemi Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that serves as a repository for video files common to all users.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che viene usata come repository per i file video comuni a tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for Internet cookies.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository comune dei cookie di Internet.

trans-unit.source: The logical Desktop rather than the physical file system location.
trans-unit.target: Desktop logico anziché percorso fisico del file system.

trans-unit.source: The directory used to physically store file objects on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata per archiviare fisicamente gli oggetti file sul desktop.

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse this directory with the desktop folder itself, which is a virtual folder.
trans-unit.target: Non confondere questa directory con la cartella desktop, che è una cartella virtuale.

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for the user's favorite items.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository degli elementi preferiti dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: A virtual folder that contains fonts.
trans-unit.target: Cartella virtuale che contiene i tipi di carattere.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for Internet history items.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository comune degli elementi della cronologia di Internet.

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for temporary Internet files.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository comune dei file temporanei Internet.

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data that is used by the current, non-roaming user.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository comune dei dati specifici dell'applicazione usati dall'utente non roaming corrente.

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains localized resource data.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene i dati di risorsa localizzati.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The **My Computer** folder.
trans-unit.target: Cartella **Risorse del computer**.

trans-unit.source: The MyComputer constant always yields the empty string ("") because no path is defined for the My Computer folder.
trans-unit.target: La costante MyComputer restituisce sempre una stringa vuota ("") perché è definito alcun percorso per la cartella di risorse del Computer.

trans-unit.source: The **My Documents** folder.
trans-unit.target: Cartella **Documenti**.

trans-unit.source: This member is equivalent to Personal.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è equivalente al personale.

trans-unit.source: The **My Music** folder.
trans-unit.target: Cartella **Musica**.

trans-unit.source: The **My Pictures** folder.
trans-unit.target: Cartella **Immagini**.

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that serves as a repository for videos that belong to a user.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che viene usata come repository per i video che appartengono a un utente.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A file system directory that contains the link objects that may exist in the **My Network Places** virtual folder.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene gli oggetti collegamento che esistono nella cartella virtuale **Risorse di rete**.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for documents.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository comune dei documenti.

trans-unit.source: This member is equivalent to MyDocuments.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è equivalente a documenti.

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains the link objects that can exist in the **Printers** virtual folder.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene gli oggetti collegamento che possono esistere nella cartella virtuale **Stampanti**.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The program files directory.
trans-unit.target: Directory dei programmi.

trans-unit.source: On a non-x86 system, passing <see cref="F:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles" /> to the <see cref="M:System.Environment.GetFolderPath(System.Environment.SpecialFolder)" /> method returns the path for non-x86 programs.
trans-unit.target: In un sistema non x86, il passaggio di <see cref="F:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles" /> al metodo <see cref="M:System.Environment.GetFolderPath(System.Environment.SpecialFolder)" /> restituisce il percorso dei programmi non x86.

trans-unit.source: To get the x86 program files directory on a non-x86 system, use the <see cref="F:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFilesX86" /> member.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere la directory dei file di programma x86 in un sistema non x86, usare il membro <see cref="F:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFilesX86" />.

trans-unit.source: The x86 **Program Files** folder.
trans-unit.target: Cartella **Programmi** x86.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory that contains the user's program groups.
trans-unit.target: Directory contenente i gruppi di programmi dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: The directory that contains the user's most recently used documents.
trans-unit.target: Directory contenente i documenti usati di recente dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: The file system directory that contains resource data.
trans-unit.target: Directory del file system che contiene i dati di risorsa.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory that contains the Send To menu items.
trans-unit.target: Directory contenente le voci del menu Invia a.

trans-unit.source: The directory that contains the Start menu items.
trans-unit.target: Directory contenente le voci del menu Start.

trans-unit.source: The directory that corresponds to the user's Startup program group.
trans-unit.target: Directory corrispondente al gruppo di programmi di Esecuzione automatica dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: The system starts these programs whenever a user logs on or starts Windows NT or later, or starts Windows 98.
trans-unit.target: Avvio di tali programmi del sistema ogni volta che un utente accede o avvia Windows NT o versioni successive, o l'avvio di Windows 98.

trans-unit.source: The System directory.
trans-unit.target: Directory System.

trans-unit.source: The Windows **System** folder.
trans-unit.target: Cartella **System** di Windows.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The directory that serves as a common repository for document templates.
trans-unit.target: Directory usata come repository comune dei modelli di documenti.

trans-unit.source: The user's profile folder.
trans-unit.target: Cartella del profilo dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: Applications should not create files or folders at this level; they should put their data under the locations referred to by <see cref="F:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.ApplicationData" />.
trans-unit.target: Le applicazioni non devono creare file o cartelle a questo livello; devono inserire i dati nei percorsi a cui fa riferimento il campo <see cref="F:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.ApplicationData" />.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The Windows directory or SYSROOT.
trans-unit.target: Directory di Windows o SYSROOT.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the %windir% or %SYSTEMROOT% environment variables.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde alle variabili di ambiente %windir% o %SYSTEMROOT%.

trans-unit.source: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aggiunto in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
